plot: The adventures of three third-class musicians who form a band "La Kampanela" and travel through central Serbia, playing in kafanas.
plot_en: The adventures of three third-class musicians who form a band "La Kampanela" and travel through central Serbia, playing in kafanas.
plot_es: The adventures of three third-class musicians who form a band "La Kampanela" and travel through central Serbia, playing in kafanas.
title: Muzikanti
